```{r}
#loading packages
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(mosaic)
library(ggplot2)
library(shiny)
library(maps)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
new_data <- all_data %>%
  select(c("country", "main_category", "state", "proportion_funded", "pct_funded")) %>%
  filter(country == "US") %>%
  mutate(state_name = tolower(state.name[match(state, state.abb)])) %>%
  filter(main_category == "Food") 

map <- map_data("state")

kick_map <- ggplot(new_data, aes(fill = proportion_funded)) +
  geom_map(aes(map_id = state_name), map = map) +
  expand_limits(x = map$long, y = map$lat)

print(kick_map)

```
